== All Mode Bandplan ==

The following is a listing of frequencies that all licensees may operate on with any mode.
With the exception of Novices (one of the depreciated licenses).

License Privileges are listed first with the Bandplan following.
Listed by country as plans may change in your area depending on propagation.
Please post any differences.
